text: (lively music)

- Capgemini is a global
financial services organization.

Currently there is so much
shortage of the talent,
so much competition out there, right?
So many companies are shifting
in leveraging this young talent.
And as part of this, one of the key things

that Capgemini is focused on
is providing opportunities

and building a bridge between
technology and society,
not for the privileged people,
but just for everyone else as well,
which includes diversity
and people from underrepresented minority.
The focus for Capgemini
is to build a lot of talent internally

and partner with organization
like AWS re/Start

so that we can get that
talent specifically

with diversity and
underrepresented minority

and give them opportunities
to work within Capgemini.
AWS re/Start, what we are seeing
is the curriculum that they have

and the training and
certification that they provide

aligns a lot with Capgemini
Digital Academy, right?
And that Digital Academy is focused
towards building that talent
and providing them real life projects
so that they can get that opportunity
and initiate their careers in technology.
